all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, let no man glory in man, but rather let him glory in God, who shall subdue all enemies under his feet.
Doctrine and Covenants 76:61
Quote of the Day
"We love you; you can do it; we accept you; and with the Savior, you will have strength to do all."
Elder Scott D. Whiting | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
